carrier_review_title: Nigute unyuzwe na serivisi yo kohereza?
search_title: Nyamuneka andika numero yawe yo gukurikirana, numero yawe yo gutumiza cyangwa imeri yawe hanyuma ubone ibisubizo byo gukurikirana.
search_input_placeholder: Nyamuneka andika numero yawe yo gukurikirana, Andika numero cyangwa imeri yawe
description_no_info: Ikirango cyo kohereza cyakozwe, ariko paki ntirasuzumwa kandi / cyangwa ngo itore nuwitwaye.
description_pre_transit: Umwikorezi yakiriye amakuru ajyanye na paki, ariko ntirasuzumwa kandi iratoragurwa.
description_delivery_in_progress: Ipaki yageze mukarere kandi iri muburyo bwo gutangwa.
description_in_transit: Ipaki igenda yerekeza. Urashobora kwakira amakuru menshi yubwoko nkuko paki igenda yerekeza aho igana.
description_customs_clearance: Porogaramu yawe irimo gutunganywa na gasutamo. Niba bikenewe, urashobora kuvugana kubindi byangombwa, amakuru cyangwa kwishyura imisoro / imisoro. Nyamuneka witegure gutanga ibisobanuro byasabwe vuba.
description_return_to_sender: Ipaki ntabwo yatanzwe none iri munzira isubira kubohereje.
description_expired: Ipaki ntabwo ifite ivugurura ryiminsi 30 nyuma yo kuyishiraho.
description_transit_limit_exceeded: Ipaki yagiye munzira ndende kurenza igihe gisanzwe cyo gutambuka cyemerera. Nyamuneka hamagara umwikorezi.
description_unsuccessful_delivery: Gutanga ntibyatsinzwe. Mubisanzwe serivisi yo gutanga isiga ubutumwa ikagerageza kongera gutanga.
description_error: Ntibishobora gukurikirana iyi parcelle kubera ibibazo bya tekiniki. Nyamuneka ongera ukurikirane.
description_exception: Ibindi byoherezwa bidasanzwe. Nyamuneka hamagara umwikorezi.
description_available_for_pickup: Porogaramu iraboneka kuri pikipiki ivuye mubigo byabatwara.
no_numbers: Nta makuru yabonetse. < br / > Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze hamwe namakuru yukuri cyangwa ubaze abakiriya.
no_trackings: Ntakintu na kimwe: ) < br > Parcelle yawe izerekanwa hano < br > bakimara koherezwa.
